unnormalised: AI will take our jobs, they said. Now I'm just waiting for it to debug my code instead of spending 3 hrs on a missing semicolon. Maybe by v2.0 it'll also make chai?
normalised: A-I will take our jobs, they said. Now I'm just waiting for it to debug my code instead of spending three hours on a missing semicolon. Maybe by version two point zero it'll also make chai?
